proposal1.heroHeadline: Rokk3r is losing 500 hours a year on proposals. Here's where it goes.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Rokk3r's manual proposals take hours. Our system generates them in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: These are the ongoing losses Rokk3r faces without automation.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Each proposal takes up to 10 hours. That's 10 hours not spent on innovation and growth.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Every inconsistent proposal costs credibility. Credibility loss equates to losing potential clients.

problems.title: Lost Deals
problems.description: Delayed proposals mean lost opportunities. Each day of delay risks a competitor closing the deal.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Manual work requires dedicated hours. At $50/hour, proposal writing costs Rokk3r $25,000 yearly.

problems.title: Resource Allocation
problems.description: Resources tied up in proposals can't be used for venture building. This bottleneck affects service delivery.

problems.title: Error Prone
problems.description: Manual entries lead to errors. Each error damages client trust and can cost future partnerships.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces these costly inefficiencies with seamless automation.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Proposals currently take hours to create. Our system delivers polished, client-ready documents in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Brand alignment is currently hit or miss. The AI ensures every proposal is on-brand and professional.

solutions.title: Real-Time Tracking
solutions.description: Currently, follow-ups are manual and error-prone. Our system tracks interactions, ensuring timely follow-ups.

solutions.title: AI Chatbot
solutions.description: Client queries are currently handled manually. The AI chatbot provides instant responses, improving client satisfaction.

solutions.title: Error Reduction
solutions.description: Manual errors are costly. The AI minimizes errors, safeguarding Rokk3r's reputation and client relations.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Rokk3r's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Rokk3r around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Rokk3r.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Growth with Rokk3r's Expertise
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Let's collaborate to enhance Acme Corp's digital presence and revenue through strategic innovation and technology.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Right now, Acme Corp is experiencing significant losses due to operational inefficiencies.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves your site without converting is revenue walking out the door. This results in an estimated loss of $50,000 monthly.

problems.title: Inefficient Operations
problems.description: Operational inefficiencies are costing Acme Corp approximately 10% of its potential productivity, leading to an estimated annual loss of $200,000.

problems.title: Weak Brand Presence
problems.description: A lack of a strong digital brand presence results in missed opportunities to engage with potential customers, leading to an estimated loss of $100,000 in potential sales annually.

problems.title: Poor Customer Retention
problems.description: Inadequate customer retention strategies are causing a churn of 20%, resulting in an annual revenue loss of $150,000.

problems.title: Inadequate Data Utilization
problems.description: Failure to leverage data for decision-making is leading to missed strategic opportunities, costing Acme Corp an estimated $75,000 annually.

problems.title: Outdated Technology
problems.description: Reliance on outdated technology is leading to increased maintenance costs, estimated at $50,000 annually.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Rokk3r's solutions directly address the losses Acme Corp is facing.

solutions.title: Digital Transformation
solutions.description: We modernize your technology stack to improve efficiency and reduce costs. This will address the outdated technology issue.

solutions.title: Growth Strategy
solutions.description: Our team crafts tailored growth strategies to boost your conversion rates and enhance customer engagement.

solutions.title: Data Analytics
solutions.description: We implement robust data analytics to enhance decision-making and strategic planning. This tackles inadequate data utilization.

solutions.title: Brand Development
solutions.description: We enhance your digital brand presence, making it more appealing and engaging for your target audience.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Rokk3r stands out by blending innovation with proven strategies.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team has a track record of successfully transforming businesses across various industries.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Approach
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with your team to ensure alignment and successful implementation.

whyUsCards.title: Tailored Solutions
whyUsCards.description: Our services are customized to meet the specific needs and goals of Acme Corp.

whyUsCards.title: Innovation Driven
whyUsCards.description: We leverage the latest technologies to drive innovation and growth for your business.

proposal2.teamIntro: Our team is dedicated to your success.

team.name: Juan Montoya
team.bio: Juan leads our strategy and client relationships with a focus on delivering impactful results. His experience spans over a decade in the tech industry.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Planning
process.description: We begin by understanding your unique challenges and goals.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: Our team crafts a detailed strategy tailored to your needs.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We execute the strategy with precision and agility.

process.title: Optimization & Review
process.description: We refine the process to ensure optimal results.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Explore our investment options to transform Acme Corp.

pricing.name: Basic
pricing.description: Ideal for businesses seeking foundational improvements.

pricing.name: Standard
pricing.description: Our recommended package for comprehensive growth.

pricing.name: Premium
pricing.description: For businesses ready to fully transform and innovate.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's have a conversation about how we can work together to achieve your goals.
proposal2.footerSub: Innovation at the heart of growth.

lead.company_description: Rokk3r is one of the first Venture Builders in the world focused on emerging and exponential technology.  Rokk3r partners with entrepreneurs, corporations, and investors to build and scale technology-enabled companies and business models. Since 2012, Rokk3r has built over 50 companies, designed over 200 digital products, and worked with dozens of entrepreneurs and leading corporations across four continents and multiple industries to develop innovative ventures. Our main services include Venture Building, Digital Transformation, and Accelerator As a Service.
lead.headline: CEO @ Rokk3r, I Partner With Corporations, Entrepreneurs, And Investors To Bring New Businesses, Products, And Services To Life.
